configuration.title: Live Blog Writer
configuration.platform.description: [DEPRECATED] Blog platform to publish to. Use liveBlogWriter.blogs for multiple blog support.
configuration.platform.deprecationMessag: Use liveBlogWriter.blogs array instead for better multi-blog support
configuration.blogs.description: Array of blog configurations. Each entry should have: name, platform, id (optional), username (optional)
configuration.blogs.name.description: Display name for this blog configuration
configuration.blogs.id.description: Blog ID (for Blogger), URL (for WordPress/Ghost), or hostname (for Substack).
configuration.blogs.username.description: Username (for WordPress, Substack). Optional for others.
configuration.defaultBlog.description: Default blog name to use when publishing. Must match the 'name' field of a blog in liveBlogWriter.blogs. If not set or not found, you'll be prompted to select a blog.
configuration.wordpress.url.description: [DEPRECATED] WordPress site URL. Use liveBlogWriter.blogs instead.
configuration.blogger.blogId.description: [DEPRECATED] Blogger Blog ID. Use liveBlogWriter.blogs instead.
